column3:
Massive performance improvement.

Adding 10k keys went from 10 minutes to <10 seconds.

Nice to see @pstratem work on the wallet!

Code-Review utACK.
That's a very nice speed improvement.\nConcept ACK.\n

My laptop goes from simply locking up in a few minutes and crashing(something IO related that I can't figure out) to ~2 seconds.  

lightly tested ACK
Certainly would like to see some version of this go in...\n
@laanwj yes i agree the if/else everywhere would get ugly very fast\n
